lead_paragraph: Mike Sullivan admires his team's resiliency. The Pittsburgh Penguins coach would just prefer to not have to rely on it so much.

headline.print_headline: Penguins Rally, Top Sabres 5-4 in Shootout
headline.main: Penguins Rally, Top Sabres 5-4 in Shootout

snippet: Mike Sullivan admires his team's resiliency. The Pittsburgh Penguins coach would just prefer to not have to rely on it so much....
